system.description:
You have been trained in both doctrine and covert skills, allowing you to go places and do things where more obvious servants of your divine patron would encounter problems. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d8k1x28y4vn6h3q5]{Cunning Action}, in addition to the normal options available to a rogue, you can also choose to cast a cleric cantrip that does not deal damage or impose a condition. You cannot use this option if you have already cast a spell this turn.
  • You gain proficiency with the Insight skill or an expertise die if you already have it. Your maximum Insight expertise die size increases to a d10.
  • When you deal @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} damage, you can spend a point of exertion to change the bonus damage to your choice of radiant or necrotic damage.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in cleric, 3 levels in rogue
